name: Example Rules Set
description: Collection of example rules for common email cleanup scenarios

rules.name: Delete Old Promotional Emails
rules.description: Delete promotional emails older than 7 days to keep inbox clean

rules.name: Auto-read Notification Emails
rules.description: Automatically mark notification emails as read

rules.name: Delete Large Attachments
rules.description: Delete emails with large attachments older than 90 days

rules.name: Organize Receipt Emails
rules.description: Label receipt emails for easy organization

rules.name: Delete Old Newsletters
rules.description: Delete newsletter emails older than 30 days

rules.name: Archive Old Sent Emails
rules.description: Archive sent emails older than 1 year

rules.name: Auto-read Social Media Notifications
rules.description: Automatically mark social media notifications as read

rules.name: Delete Spam-like Emails
rules.description: Delete emails with common spam keywords

criteria.has_words: urgent action required OR limited time offer OR act now

metadata.author: Gmail Cleanup Team
usage_notes: Start with dry_run: true to test rules
Adjust older_than_days values based on your needs
Be careful with delete actions - they are permanent
